llm_res.rule: allowance function should return the amount which _spender is still allowed to withdraw from _owner.

llm_res:
YES

The function `allowance` in the provided code violates the ERC-20 standard rule by returning the allowance amount with an additional 34 units added to the actual allowed amount. According to the ERC-20 standard, the `allowance` function should return the exact amount that a spender is still allowed to withdraw from the owner, without any modifications.
